content: ready to make a gorgeous and easy chunky crochet scarf the stonehaven scarf as quick and simple as it is beauitful grab your favorite bulky yarn and let s get started this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level beginner finished size 6 w by 65 long hook size us size l/8 0mm crochet hook yarn samples used category 5 bulky weight yarn pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 https //www stitching-together com/chunky-crochet-scarf-pattern-free/
